prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing anniversary greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

üé® CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clich√© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "Say I love you to girlfriend"
Style: ü§ñ AI Smart Style
Tone: ‚ù§Ô∏è Heartfelt - sincere and emotional
To: Lao Lao
From: Jordan
Message: "My dearest Lao Lao,

Happy Anniversary. Every day I spend with you feels like a beautiful dream, and my heart is so full of love for the incredible person you are. I can't imagine my life without you in it, and I love you more than words can say.

All my love,
Jordan"



CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front ‚Üí interior ‚Üí back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the sincere and emotional tone throughout all sections








Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "anniversary" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). Create charming cartoon-style or stylized illustrated figures if people are needed for the theme. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in a whimsical and romantic gouache and watercolor illustration style, featuring a charming, stylized depiction of two people, representing Jordan and Lao Lao, slow dancing under a canopy of glowing paper lanterns. The background is a soft, dreamlike wash of twilight purples and warm pinks, with fireflies dotting the air. The figures are rendered with gentle, expressive lines and a soft, warm color palette, conveying a sense of intimate joy and deep affection. The overall effect is painterly and heartfelt, with visible brushstrokes and a handmade quality that feels deeply personal and created with love.

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! The AI has complete creative freedom to design whatever it wants for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a anniversary card with sincere and emotional tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in a whimsical and romantic gouache and watercolor illustration style, featuring a charming, stylized depiction of two people, representing Jordan and Lao Lao, slow dancing under a canopy of glowing paper lanterns. The background is a soft, dreamlike wash of twilight purples and warm pinks, with fireflies dotting the air. The figures are rendered with gentle, expressive lines and a soft, warm color palette, conveying a sense of intimate joy and deep affection. The overall effect is painterly and heartfelt, with visible brushstrokes and a handmade quality that feels deeply personal and created with love.

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "My dearest Lao Lao,

Happy Anniversary. Every day I spend with you feels like a beautiful dream, and my heart is so full of love for the incredible person you are. I can't imagine my life without you in it, and I love you more than words can say.

All my love,
Jordan" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clich√© designs and create something genuinely special! Style: in a whimsical and romantic gouache and watercolor illustration style, featuring a charming, stylized depiction of two people, representing Jordan and Lao Lao, slow dancing under a canopy of glowing paper lanterns. The background is a soft, dreamlike wash of twilight purples and warm pinks, with fireflies dotting the air. The figures are rendered with gentle, expressive lines and a soft, warm color palette, conveying a sense of intimate joy and deep affection. The overall effect is painterly and heartfelt, with visible brushstrokes and a handmade quality that feels deeply personal and created with love.

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO TEXT and NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in a whimsical and romantic gouache and watercolor illustration style, featuring a charming, stylized depiction of two people, representing Jordan and Lao Lao, slow dancing under a canopy of glowing paper lanterns. The background is a soft, dreamlike wash of twilight purples and warm pinks, with fireflies dotting the air. The figures are rendered with gentle, expressive lines and a soft, warm color palette, conveying a sense of intimate joy and deep affection. The overall effect is painterly and heartfelt, with visible brushstrokes and a handmade quality that feels deeply personal and created with love.

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover: Front cover of a greeting card with a 9:16 aspect ratio, in a whimsical and romantic gouache and watercolor illustration style. The scene depicts two figures, a young person and an older person, sitting on a grassy hill and looking up at a large, luminous full moon against a deep indigo night sky. The sky is speckled with numerous small white stars and wispy patches of pink and purple nebula. The full moon, dominant in the upper half of the frame, has subtle textures and a soft glow. White, elegant script text reading "Happy Anniversary" is centered on the moon, positioned safely away from the top and bottom edges. The figures are rendered in a stylized, flat 2D illustrated manner, with visible brushstrokes suggesting a painterly, handmade quality. The younger person, on the left, wears a simple dark blue shirt and has dark hair. The older person, on the right, has grey hair styled in a bun and wears a maroon shawl. They are sitting close together, facing away from the viewer, gazing at the moon. The grassy hill below them is depicted with dark, textured brushstrokes in shades of deep green and blue, creating a sense of grounding. The overall mood is serene, intimate, and heartfelt, with a color palette dominated by deep blues, purples, and soft whites, punctuated by the warm glow of the moon and hints of pink in the sky. The composition is centered on the moon and the figures, evoking a feeling of shared wonder and lasting connection.
generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a greeting card with a whimsical and romantic gouache and watercolor illustration style. The background is a deep, starry night sky in rich indigo and navy blues, with numerous small, sparkling white dots resembling distant stars. Dominating the center is a single, ethereal feather, depicted as if falling or gently drifting downwards. The feather is rendered with soft, blended strokes, transitioning in color from a luminous, pale blue at its quill to delicate shades of pink and violet at its tips. It is adorned with small, bright star-like highlights, radiating a soft glow, and appears to leave a subtle, shimmering trail of stardust behind it as it descends. The overall effect is peaceful, magical, and conveys a sense of wonder and quiet beauty, offering a gentle resolution to the card's visual narrative. There is no text or indication of space reserved for QR codes.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a greeting card with a whimsical and romantic gouache and watercolor illustration style. The artwork depicts two celestial birds soaring through a deep indigo night sky filled with countless tiny white stars and subtle, sparkling stardust. The bird on the left is composed of shimmering pink and purple cosmic dust, its wings outstretched and its body outlined by faint white star constellations. A trail of vibrant, flowing pink nebula-like smoke emanates from its tail. The bird on the right is crafted from glowing teal and turquoise cosmic matter, similarly outlined with constellations, and trailing a stream of ethereal turquoise mist. The overall composition is painterly, with visible brushstrokes and a textured, handmade feel, evoking a sense of wonder, magic, and deep connection. The colors are rich and blended, creating a dreamy, ethereal atmosphere. No text or characters are present, allowing the celestial imagery to convey the heartfelt emotion.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with a whimsical and romantic gouache and watercolor illustration style. The background is a deep, celestial navy blue, speckled with twinkling stars and soft, glowing bokeh. Two stylized, ethereal birds, one teal and one magenta, are depicted in flight, their forms creating a graceful, embracing curve around the central text area. Delicate, swirling, feather-like fronds in shades of teal and deep indigo frame the sides and top, interspersed with small, luminous starbursts. The overall impression is magical and dreamy, with a gradient of purples and pinks emanating from the center to suggest an aurora or a gentle embrace. The typography for the message "My dearest Lao Lao, Happy Anniversary. Every day I spend with you feels like a beautiful dream, and my heart is so full of love for the incredible person you are. I can't imagine my life without you in it, and I love you more than words can say. All my love, Jordan" is a clear, slightly elegant serif font in a soft white, perfectly legible against the dark, artistic background, and positioned safely within the central area to accommodate handwritten additions. The design creates a harmonious balance between vibrant, illustrative decoration and ample, clear space for personal messages, evoking a heartfelt and deeply affectionate tone.
